import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Table, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listProducts } from '../actions/productActions' function ProductListScreen({ history, match }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList) const {loading, error, products} = productList const userLogin= useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const {userInfo} = userLogin useEffect(() => { if(userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin){ dispatch(listProducts()) }else{ history.push('/login') } }, [dispatch, history, userInfo]) const deleteHandler = (id) => { if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to this product?')){ //pass } } const createProductHandler = (product) => { //create product } return (

Products

 {loading ? : error ? ({error}) : ( {products.map(product => ( ))}
ID NAME PRICE CATEGORY BRAND
{product._id} {product.name} {product.price} {product.category} {product.brand}
) }
) } export default ProductListScreen
